snippet.title: Half-Life: Alyx – Official Gameplay Trailer #3 (Combine Shootout)
snippet.description:
Check out what VR combat looks like in Half-Life: Alyx, as you wield the shotgun (as well as a partially upgraded pistol) and take on Combine soldiers in a tense firefight.

Half-Life: Alyx will be released on all PC-based VR platforms on March 23. Stay tuned to IGN all March long for exclusive coverage!

#ign #gaming #halflifealyx
